doc:
Richard Thomas (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Thomas_(actor) 0 Richard Earl Thomas (born June 13, 1951) is an American actor. He is best known for his leading role as budding author John-Boy Walton in the CBS drama The Waltons, for which he won one Emmy Award and received nominations for another Emmy Award and two Golden Globe Awards. He also played Special Agent Frank Gaad on FX's spy thriller series The Americans (2013–2016), appeared in Stephen King's mini series IT (1990), and had a supporting role in the comedy-drama film Wonder Boys (2000). Richard_Earl_Thomas ( born June_13_,_1951 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_leading_role as budding author_John-Boy_Walton in the_CBS_drama The_Waltons , for which he won one_Emmy_Award and received nominations for another_Emmy_Award and two_Golden_Globe_Awards . He also played Special_Agent_Frank_Gaad on FX 's_spy_thriller_series The_Americans ( 2013 – 2016_) , appeared in Stephen_King 's_mini_series_IT_(_1990_) , and had a_supporting_role in the_comedy-drama_film_Wonder_Boys ( 2000_) .
